OOC: Once again, no.  Beast Wars is an American/Canadian creation, from 
Mainframe Entertainment. Same thing goes for Beast Machines.  Your cousins 
boyfriend probably mistook Silverbolt for someone else since he has never 
been in command.  Robots in Disguise originated in Japan, being the only 
Japanese Transformers series so far to come to our shores. Gobots is 
COMPLETELY UNRELATED to Transformers.  It was a rival show and toyline in the 
80s, but Transformers was infinitely more popular(and better).

--part1_3a.1cc06ee4.290b1da0_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Same thing goes for Beast Machines.  Your cousins boyfriend probably mistook Silverbolt for someone else since he has never been in command.  Robots in Disguise originated in Japan, being the only Japanese Transformers series so far to come to our shores. Gobots is COMPLETELY UNRELATED to Transformers.  It was a rival show and toyline in the 80s, but Transformers was infinitely more popular(and better).</FONT></HTML>

--part1_3a.1cc06ee4.290b1da0_boundary--
